threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: High value Data storage for the company once gained access by an unathurised user can be pivtal for company failure
threats.mitigation: Seperate it from the company by only allowing certain users who have access to it rather than everyone in the company

threats.title: Denial of Service
threats.description: Once a user has gain access via the CRM he is now able to follow his way through into the customer Database and have access to not onlt his but other peoples data as well
threats.mitigation: Only allow a selected amount of users to have access to this node to prevent unauthroised traffic
